chat.title: steroids
chat.message: add dexamethasone (if more worried about biphasic reaction) and hydrocortisone (if in shock). is it possible to have medication categories? ex. all steroids under a subheading

chat.title: wrong title on launch page
chat.message: is labelled as anaphylaxis instead of blood and body fluid exposure

chat.title: Occupational health and safety report
chat.message: Looks good clinically. Could add report to Occupational Health and Safety (but perhaps patient does that themselves)
